hero.title: Clinical-grade synthetic data — with proof
hero.subtitle: Gesalp AI turns sensitive clinical tables into synthesist real data: realistic, privacy-safe datasets audited for utility and compliance. Built for sponsors, CROs, and AI teams.

agent.title: Agent data scientist
agent.body: Our agent selects the right generator (GC/CTGAN/TVAE/diffusion), tunes hyper-params, and optimizes for your objective (privacy-first, utility-first, or balanced).

privacy.title: Privacy with proof
privacy.body: Every dataset ships with an audit: DCR p01, MIA advantage, k-anonymity, and optional DP (ε, δ). Green-light gates block release until thresholds pass.

trial.title: Trial-aware synthesis
trial.body: Survival/censoring aware. Supports longitudinal vitals/labs and irregular time-series.

deploy.title: Deploy anywhere
deploy.body: Use our SaaS or run on-prem. The on-prem engine only publishes when all privacy/utility gates are green.

governance.title: Governance & lineage
governance.body: Dataset cards capture source URI+hash, cohort ε, metrics, and post-processing steps for audit trails.

marketplace.title: Marketplace ready
marketplace.body: Publish to your catalog: consumers can use the data without owning the originals—Snowflake-style access controls.

upload.title: Upload or connect
upload.description: Securely upload CSV/Parquet or connect your table.

start.title: Click Start
start.description: Agent chooses model + tuning; optional advanced settings.

evaluate.title: Evaluate
evaluate.description: See privacy & utility metrics update in real time.

deliver.title: Deliver
deliver.description: Download CSV/Parquet + audit PDF/JSON, or publish to marketplace.

privacy.title: Measurable privacy
privacy.description: Distance-to-closest-record, membership inference AUC, k-anon/ℓ-diversity, optional DP accounting.

utility.title: Real utility
utility.description: TSTR/RTS, AUROC/AUPRC, drift (KS/AD/PSI), and correlation/MI delta—benchmarked vs. real baseline.

enterprise.title: Enterprise-ready
enterprise.description: On-prem mode, SSO, role-based access, air-gapped deployments, and regulator-friendly reports.

privacy.question: How do you ensure privacy?
privacy.answer: We generate new rows from learned distributions and audit with DCR/MIA/k-anon; optional DP records effective ε, δ.

differentialPrivacy.question: Do you support Differential Privacy?
differentialPrivacy.answer: Yes—configurable. When enabled, runs include cohort ε summaries and stop-gates.

onPrem.question: Can we run on-prem?
onPrem.answer: Yes. Air-gapped or VPC. On-prem only publishes when all gates pass.

dataTypes.question: What data types are supported?
dataTypes.answer: Tabular (categorical, numeric, dates), with support for longitudinal/time-series trial data.

mlLabels.question: Is the output labeled for ML?
mlLabels.answer: If labels exist in the source, we preserve distributions; TSTR reports quantify downstream performance.

footer.copyright: © 2025 GESALP AI — Synthetic data for clinical research.
